result.arabic_text: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
result.translation: Kuri nya bisaswa, hazoba hicaye n’abakenyezi bagumiza akajisho ku bagabo babo, barangwa n’ubwiza bw’akataraboneka (Hururayini), ata muntu n’umwe canke Ijini arigera ababira imbere yuko bashingirwa kuri bo.
